text: Group Calls / Video Conferencing: significant boost in stability, up to 15 participants, all while safeguarding privacy with robust app-to-app encryption.
Calls: easy start by clicking on call indicators in DMs/Channels.
Annotations: enhanced usability with added tooltips for actions.
In-App Viewer: convenient copy of text from PDF.
File Upload: smooth indications when items are uploaded and encrypted in DMs/Channels.
Enhanced Cybersecurity: benefit from regular cybersecurity reviews, including updates to software libraries and packages, to address potential vulnerabilities.
Bug Fixes & Other Improvements: we addressed various bugs and made additional enhancements for a better experience.
